arts.ttl: Lyon predicted XI v Paris FC: Mathys De Carvalho to start
arts.sum: Paul Fonseca is set to rotate his side when they travel to face Paris FC on Wednesday night. Mathys De Carvalho could come into the Olympique Lyonnais midfield, with Tannerâ€¦

Paris FC have enjoyed an impressive start to the season, but they have picked up just one win in their previous four league games. They're in danger of slipping back down the table, losing two games o...
